name: Blinkity Blank
summary: Blinkity Blank is a fine example of music creating image, the sounds you hear are mimiked it seems with the forms and flow of motion that is on the screen. From fireworks to Egyptian forms and birdcages, over a blue surface, the images being etched directly onto the cell print we are taken on a five minute voyage with basoon, trumpet, clarinet and drum.
